pr_title: Avoid ObjectMapper CDI warning in Funky Google Cloud Functions

timeline.bodyHTML:
Suggested change
public void markObjectMapper(BuildProducer<UnremovableBeanBuildItem> unremovable) {
public void markObjectMapperUnremovable(BuildProducer<UnremovableBeanBuildItem> unremovable) {

?
timeline.author: gsmet

timeline.message: fix: avoid CDI warning in ObjectMapper
fix: avoid CDI warning in ObjectMapper

timeline.body: BTW, not mandatory, but I think that just making the `ObjectMapper` unremovable would be sufficient. The producer will follow.
timeline.bodyText: BTW, not mandatory, but I think that just making the ObjectMapper unremovable would be sufficient. The producer will follow.
timeline.bodyHTML: BTW, not mandatory, but I think that just making the ObjectMapper unremovable would be sufficient. The producer will follow.
timeline.author: gsmet

replies.bodyText: Just tested it and it didn't work if I remove the ObjectMapperProducer unremovable built item.
replies.author: loicmathieu

replies.bodyText: Hmmm, that's weird. But let's keep it that way.
replies.author: gsmet
